p: When available, viral genomes modified with reporter genes can be used for cell-based luminescent or fluorescent screening of viral inhibitors ( Beadle et al., 2016, Edwards et al., 2015, Fenaux et al., 2016, Feng et al., 2014, Lo et al., 2017, Madhvi et al., 2017, Wang et al., 2015c). This approach can be extended to screen inhibitors of other enzymes. In the aptamer-based approach, a DNA template encodes RNA of interest joined to a fluorescence module and ribozyme sequence.
